languages.text: The wearer gains +15 Persuasion and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius. -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains +15 Persuasion and the Inquisitor's Command ability that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 momentum -Burning, bleeding, and toxin effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary wounds

The wearer gains +15 Persuasion and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius. -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者获得+15{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}，每场战斗可以使用一次审判官命令{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。 审判官命令会产生以下效果： - +20{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。 - 移除5格内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。 - 5格内所有盟友获得（装备者的劝说/7）点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius. -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者获得+15劝说，每场战斗可以使用一次审判官命令能力。 审判官命令会产生以下效果： - +20士气。 - 移除5格内所有盟友的燃烧、流血与毒素效果。 - 5格内所有盟友获得（装备者的劝导/7）点临时生命值。

languages.text: El portador gana +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Orden del Inquisidor, que puede usarse una vez por combate. Orden del Inquisidor proporciona: -+20 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}. -Cura los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} a todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas. -Todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas ganan +(Persuasión del portador / 7) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius. -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El portador gana +15 de Persuasión y la capacidad Orden del Inquisidor, que puede usarse una vez por combate. Orden del Inquisidor proporciona: -+20 de ímpetu -Cura los efectos de quemadura, hemorragia y toxina a todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas -Todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas ganan +(Persuasión del portador / 7) heridas temporales

languages.text: Der Träger erhält +15 Überredung und die Fähigkeit Inquisitors Befehl, die einmal pro Kampf genutzt werden kann. Inquisitors Befehl gewährt: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} -Die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten in einem 5-Zellen-Radius entfernt. -Alle Verbündeten in einem 5-Zellen-Radius erhalten +(Überredung des Trägers / 7) temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +15 Persuasion and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius. -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält +15 Überredung und die Fähigkeit Inquisitors Befehl, die einmal pro Kampf genutzt werden kann. Inquisitors Befehl gewährt: -+20 Dynamik -Die Effekte Verbrennung, Blutung und Gift werden von allen Verbündeten in einem 5-Zellen-Radius entfernt. -Alle Verbündeten in einem 5-Zellen-Radius erhalten +(Überredung des Trägers / 7) temporäre Wunden.

languages.text: L'utilisateur obtient +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Commandement de l'Inquisiteur utilisable une fois par combat. Commandement de l'Inquisiteur confère : -+20 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}. -Les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} sont supprimés sur tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases. -Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases bénéficient de +(Persuasion de l'utilisateur / 7) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius. -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur obtient +15 de Persuasion et la capacité Commandement de l'Inquisiteur utilisable une fois par combat. Commandement de l'Inquisiteur confère : - +20 de fougue - Les effets Combustion, Saignement et Toxine sont supprimés sur tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases - Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases bénéficient de +(Persuasion de l'utilisateur / 7) blessures temporaires

languages.text: Персонаж получает +15 к Убеждению, а также {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Приказ инквизитора, которую можно применять 1 раз за бой. Действие Приказа инквизитора: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. -Со всех союзников в радиусе 5 клеток снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}. -Все союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +(Убеждение персонажа / 7) временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +15 Persuasion and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius. -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает +15 к Убеждению, а также способность Приказ инквизитора, которую можно применять 1 раз за бой. Действие Приказа инквизитора: -+20 моментума -Со всех союзников в радиусе 5 клеток снимаются эффекты горения, кровотечения и отравления -Все союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +(Убеждение персонажа / 7) временного здоровья

Персонаж получает +15 к Убеждению, а также способность Приказ инквизитора, которую можно применять 1 раз за бой. Действие Приказа инквизитора: -+20 моментума -Со всех союзников в радиусе 5 клеток снимаются эффекты горения, кровотечения и отравления -Все союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +(Убеждение персонажа / 7) временного здоровья

languages.text: 使用者は+15の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}と、1度の戦闘に1度使える審問官の指揮{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。 審問官の指揮は以下を与える： -+20の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}。 -半径5セル以内の味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}の効果は取り除かれる。 -半径5セル以内の味方全員は(使用者の説得/7)の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius. -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は+15の説得と、1度の戦闘に1度使える審問官の指揮アビリティを得る。 審問官の指揮は以下を与える： -+20の推進力 -半径5セル以内の味方全員の炎上、出血、毒の効果は取り除かれる -半径5セル以内の味方全員は(使用者の説得/7)の一時体力を得る
